about.about_description: I am a software engineer, specializing in cross-platform mobile applications. From sleek UI designs to robust back-end integrations, I specialize in crafting captivating mobile experiences. Let's elevate your software to new heights.

profile.name: Christo PB
profile.what_am_i: As a software engineer, I have a deep passion for coding and enjoy experimenting with programming techniques. Additionally, I have a keen interest in electronics, often engaging in the development and programming of embedded systems, IoT and circuits as hobby projects. Music holds a special place in my heart, and I am an avid keyboard player who also dabbles in music mixing, mastering, and production. My love for science is immense, and whenever I come across something related to it, I am always eager to learn more. Since childhood, I have been naturally curious and inquisitive about the world around me.
